location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Captain G Walker, Senior Officer of the Marine

mods.abstract: Riach gives instructions for the movements of the Nautilus, and informs Walker that the Antelopehad gone to Bahrine [Bahrain] and Abothbee [Abu Dhabi] to investigate the seizure of boats at Bedda. He asks for any information about this, and a reciprocal seizure.
